response.overview: This video project offers an in-depth exploration of Italian society, examining what it means to grow up and live as members of the Black and Queer community within a strongly Eurocentric and heteronormative reality. Through interviews and conversations with seven Italian Black Queer individuals, the project creates a safe space to share their stories. It aims to both celebrate the beauty and resilience of the Black Queer Italian experience and shed light on the racism, queerphobia, homophobia, and transphobia that often overshadow it.
response.title: The Queer Black Italian Experience
